name: Keeper of the Fog
description:
Meet Dana. She's your average, all-American monster hunter living after an arcane apocalypse. Hired to find missing scavengers who'd entered a haunted house, the huntress fox finds her work cut out for her...


Her world had ended nearly about fifty years ago, still caught in early 2000s stasis. Monsters and magic thought to be fantasy became a waking nightmare for those who survived. Dana, a ranger of the overgrown ruins, fights to protect and avenge such survivors. When a group of friends fail return from a house best left avoided, the investigating vixen discovers the secrets behind their slaughter... and of their eldritch assailant.

This is that story, and these are her problems.


"Keeper of the Fog" is a somewhat non-linear RPG, created for RMN's Commonplace Book event. The prompt was taken from a notebook of HP Lovecraft's, which he had written down various ideas for stories. The entry I was given was: "219. Fog or smoke—assumes shaped under incantations." Guide Dana through the hell house, looking for clues and equipment to confront its ghostly master.
